## Transect Data 
```{r}
library(rgdal)
library(ggplot2)
mapdata<-read.csv("/Users/amythor86/Documents/GitHub/REM504-DataScience/Practice_Datasets/student_data/Amy_data/Waypoints.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
head(mapdata)
```

```{r}
ggplot() + geom_point(data=mapdata, aes(x=Longitude, y=Latitude, size=Richness), color="red")
```


```{r}
counties<-readOGR(dsn = "/Users/amythor86/Documents/GitHub/REM504-DataScience/Practice_Datasets/student_data/Amy_data/counties_id_ilso.shp", layer = "counties_id_ilso")

```

```{r}
ggplot() + geom_point(data=mapdata, aes(x=Elevation, y=Richness), color="red")
```
